name: BIN/IP Checker
description: Our free BIN checker can help you spot fraudulent credit card transactions. Start verifying, validating, and checking all information of credit/debit cards just using BIN numbers. Our database has +365,460 unique BINs.

api_methods.name: BIN Checker
api_methods.description:
This API is designed primarily for online store owners who want to perform a deep checking of their credit/debit card transactions, it gives a clear vision of how risky the transactions are.
However, anyone can use this API on any platform as he wants and according to his plan limits

How this API works?
The user will send the credit/debit card (Bank Identification Number) or IIN (Issuer Identification Number) to get the full details as possible.

**How to use this API?**
You have to provide a BIN (Bank Identification Number) - the first 6 digits of a credit/debit card, to receive the full details of this BIN/IIN in JSON format.

**Can I use it for free or test it?**
There are different plans that suit everyone including a free plan for a small number of requests per day, but its rate is limited to prevent abuse of the service.

**Can I use it as "Pay per Request"?**
Sure, you can use it and pay only when you use it. The credit can't be expired.

**How can I integrate it with my project?**
RapidAPI provides a wide range of integration methods for almost all programming languages. You can use these codes to integrate with your project as you need.

utterances.utterance: Can you check the details for the BIN 448590?
I need to verify the BIN 523456 for a transaction.
Please provide the information for the BIN 678901.
What details can you find for the BIN 345678?
Check the BIN 234567 for any potential risks.
I want to validate the BIN 789012.
Can you verify the BIN 890123 for me?
Please check the BIN 901234 for its details.
I need to know more about the BIN 567890.
Could you provide the information for the BIN 123456?

api_methods.name: BIN/IP Checker
api_methods.description:
This API is designed primarily for online store owners who want to perform a deep checking of their credit/debit card transactions, it gives a clear vision on how risky the transactions are.
However, any one can use this API on any platform as he wants and according to his plan limits

How this API works?
The user will send the credit/debit card (Bank Identification Number) or IIN (Issuer Identification Number) to get the full details as possible. Also, if the IP address is given with the request, it will returns the IP address details and checks the BIN information against the IP information and gives a risk score for the transaction.
It's very useful for online merchants to help them take best decision.

**How to use this API?**
If the user sends the BIN number only, it will return the full details of the BIN.
If the user sends the BIN and the IP address of his client, it will return the full details of the BIN and the details if the IP address as well with a risk score.

**Can I use it for free or test it?**
There are different plans suits everyone including a free plan for small amount of requests per day, but it's rate is limit to prevent abuse of the service.

**Can I use it as "Pay per Request"?**
Sure, you can use it and pay only when you use it. The credit can't be expired.

**How can I integrate it with my project?**
RapidAPI provides a wide range of integration methods for almost all programming languages. You can use these codes to integrate with your project as you need.

utterances.utterance: Can you check the details for the BIN number 448590?
I need to verify the BIN 520082 and the IP address 192.168.1.1 for a transaction.
Please provide the information for BIN 601111.
Check the BIN 123456 and see if it matches with IP 203.0.113.5.
What can you tell me about the BIN 411111?
I want to know the risk score for BIN 378282 and IP 10.0.0.1.
Give me the details for BIN 305693.
Can you verify BIN 601100 with the IP address 172.16.254.1?
I'd like to check the BIN 353011.
Please analyze BIN 555555 and IP 198.51.100.10 for any risks.
